## Related Works

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source("R/common.R")
source("R/latex.R")
source("R/kable.R")
LoadPackage("tidyverse")
LoadPackage("kableExtra")
```

### v1

```{r}
relatedWorks <- read.csv2("csv/related-works.csv")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
CreateScrollableTable(t(relatedWorks))
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
SaveLatexTable(t(relatedWorks), "Comparision of existing solutions and PULCEO.", "comparison-of-existing-solutions-and-pulceo", "comparison-of-existing-solutions-and-pulceo.tex", "tb", "table")
```

### Functional Requirements

```{r}
file_name <- "csv/related-works-fr.csv"

# Read the file with skip and manually define column names
relatedWorksFR <- read.csv2(file_name, skip = 1, header = FALSE, quote = "")

# Read just the first line separately to extract column names
header_line <- readLines(file_name, n = 1)
col_names <- strsplit(header_line, ";")[[1]]
colnames(relatedWorksFR) <- col_names
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
CreateScrollableTable(relatedWorksFR)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
SaveLatexTable(relatedWorksFR, "Comparision of Related Works and PULCEO", "comparison-related-works-pulceo-fr", "comparison-related-works-pulceo-fr.tex", "tb", "table")
```
